item.name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small
Cleopatra and the Society of Architects
Food Chain
item.comment: The game itself is fine, nicely edited, with intriguing theme, etc. but the rules in the box are so unclear.. No way to play it correctly without reading explanations and errata on bgg...

Journey to the Center of the Earth
Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
Space Hulk: Death Angel – The Card Game
Surprises
item.comment: I don't like memo-type games. But kids love them. Nicely edited.
